title: Episode 16: They’re at it again - My Favorite Weird Psychology Studies
description:
I thought it would be fun to take a look at some of the studies in psychology that I remember not so much because they were groundbreaking or well known (like Pavlov’s dogs or Milgram’s studies on...

Show notes and more available at http://www.thepsychfiles.com
